amendment.description: To provide minimum funding for certain types of agricultural management assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2125 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2125 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142) To provide minimum funding for certain types of agricultural management assistance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2125 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
